name: zinema
description: Zinema - Movie Booking Platform with PWA support

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/dist server/dist node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.mobile:test: cd client && npm run build && npx serve dist -p 3000
scripts.production: NODE_ENV=production npm run build && npm start

author: Zinema Team
